formulas.description: Loan name formula for in process loans for business relationships
formulas.name: loanNameFormulaBusinessInProcess
formulas.expression: {!$Record.LLC_BI__Account__r.Name} & ' - ' & TEXT({!$Record.LLC_BI__Product__c}) & ' - ' & '$' & IF( {!$Record.LLC_BI__Amount__c} >= 1000000, TEXT(FLOOR({!$Record.LLC_BI__Amount__c} / 1000000)) & ",", "") & IF( {!$Record.LLC_BI__Amount__c}>= 1000, RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR({!$Record.LLC_BI__Amount__c} / 1000)), 3) & ",", "") & RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR({!$Record.LLC_BI__Amount__c})), 3) & "." & IF( MOD({!$Record.LLC_BI__Amount__c} , 1) * 100 < 10, "0" & TEXT(ROUND(MOD({!$Record.LLC_BI__Amount__c} , 1), 2) * 100), TEXT(MIN(ROUND(MOD({!$Record.LLC_BI__Amount__c} , 1), 2) * 100, 99)) )

formulas.description: Loan name formula for non-booked/complete loans for individuals
formulas.name: loanNameFormulaIndividualBooked

formulas.description: Formula for loan name update for in process loans for individuals
formulas.name: loanNameFormulaIndividualInProcess
formulas.expression: {!$Record.LLC_BI__Account__r.FirstName} & ' ' &{!$Record.LLC_BI__Account__r.LastName} & ' - ' & TEXT({!$Record.LLC_BI__Product__c}) & ' - ' & '$' & IF( {!$Record.LLC_BI__Amount__c} >= 1000000, TEXT(FLOOR({!$Record.LLC_BI__Amount__c} / 1000000)) & ",", "") & IF( {!$Record.LLC_BI__Amount__c}>= 1000, RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR({!$Record.LLC_BI__Amount__c} / 1000)), 3) & ",", "") & RIGHT(TEXT(FLOOR({!$Record.LLC_BI__Amount__c})), 3) & "." & IF( MOD({!$Record.LLC_BI__Amount__c} , 1) * 100 < 10, "0" & TEXT(ROUND(MOD({!$Record.LLC_BI__Amount__c} , 1), 2) * 100), TEXT(MIN(ROUND(MOD({!$Record.LLC_BI__Amount__c} , 1), 2) * 100, 99)) )
